thread.title: Reese Witherspoon Made ‘Big Little Lies’ Because She ‘Had Enough’ of Hollywood Reducing Women to ‘Wives and Girlfriends’
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon Made ‘Big Little Lies’ Because She ‘Had Enough’ of Hollywood Reducing Women to ‘Wives and Girlfriends’

author: Ben Travers
title: Reese Witherspoon Made ‘Big Little Lies’ Because She ‘Had Enough’ of Hollywood Reducing Women to ‘Wives and Girlfriends’
text:
TCA: As a producer and star of HBO's upcoming limited series, Reese Witherspoon spoke about why she's motivated to find more parts and better roles for women in Hollywood during the network's TCA presentation Sunday morning.

...
